body.name: First Aid Only 91512 Critical Essentials Bleeding Control Kit for Limb Wounds, 7 Pieces

byLineInfo.name: Visit the First Aid Only Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 17 hrs 2 mins
features: Bleeding Control Kit with Tourniquet: Comes with 7 tools for responding to bleeding limb wounds, including bleeding control instructions, a marker to indicate tourniquet application time, nitrile gloves, and trauma bandages
Lightweight & Portable Bleed Control Kit: Comes in a clear bag that is easily identifiable, lightweight, and portable for efficient travel to the trauma site
Easy Access: Use as a standalone bleed control emergency kit or add to a first aid cabinet, emergency preparedness kit, or trauma bag

Versatile: This bleeding kit is ideal for remote settings, including outdoor worksites, mass bleeding events, hunting stands, recreational walking and hiking trails, campsites, public emergency, classrooms and more
Personal and Professional First Aid Solutions: First Aid Only offers a full line of first aid kits, workplace first aid, individual first aid products, burn care, CPR care, and more
body.description: This bleed control kit with tourniquet and bag contains critical essentials for treating limb wounds. The included first aid tourniquet empowers bystanders to help save a life in the critical first minutes of a bleeding emergency. The clear plastic pouch is easily identifiable, lightweight, and mobile for efficient travel to the trauma site. The critical essential first aid kit with tourniquet is ideal for a supplement to a first aid kit, and for high-risk environments such as outdoor worksites, hunting stands, recreational walking and hiking trails, campsites, and more.
